place: Via della Barriera Vecchia 32, III, Trieste (Austria)
author: James Joyce
text: Dear Sir Will you kindly let me know if any royalties stand to my credit, exclusive of musical rightsâ€™ fees, on my book Chamber Music published by you in May 1907? The royalties were to be reckoned after sale of 300 copies. Nearly 50 copies of the book to my own knowledge are in the hands of friends of mine here so that I imagine the limit must have been passed after such a long lapse of time. Very sincerely yours James Joyce
